comment._content: Wow! Do you know how many kilos was it?

comment.author: 8337233@N06
comment._content: From the image caption, this is what we know: "The largest nugget found in Alaska. September 29 01. In Discovery-Anvil. Weight-108 oz. Value $178. Actual size. Dobbs photo."
